description:
For showering, rinsing off salt water, cleaning your bike, doing dishes, or washing your dog. Unlike most outdoor showers, the Helio sits on the ground, so you don't need to find a place to hang it. It's compact, comes with a case, and has a foot pump to control water pressure.

  • 2.13m hose with a spray nozzle
  • 11L reservoir provides enough water for a 5-7 minute shower
  • Foot pump provides an easy to maintain water pressure
  • Stores easily in the included ventilated carrying case
  • Durable and food safe polyurethane coated polyester reservoir
  • Dimensions: 43 x 21.6cm, packs down to 14 x 21.6cm
name: Nemo Helio Pressure Shower
